vehicleSection.title: Choose the right vehicle for your delivery

appDownloadBanner.title: Get the app on iPhone or Android — from parcels to truckloads.

items.question: What services does your platform provide?
answer: We connect customers with verified truck drivers for on-demand or scheduled goods transportation across Saudi Arabia.

items.question: How does the booking process work?
answer: You open the app, enter pickup and drop-off locations, choose a vehicle type, negotiate rates with driver, and confirm the booking.

items.question: What types of vehicles are available?
answer: We offer multiple truck categories including pickups, Dynas, 1-ton, 3-ton, 7-ton, and 10-ton trucks to match different cargo needs.

items.question: Are your drivers licensed and verified?
answer: Yes. We verify all drivers through a complete background check, license verification, and compliance with Saudi transport regulations.

items.question: How do you ensure cargo safety?
answer: We track each trip in real time but cargo security and safety is a responsibility of the driver.

items.question: How do I pay for a trip?
answer: Currently you can pay directly to the driver using cash or online payment services like Mada or Apple Pay.

items.question: Can I schedule a truck in advance?
answer: Yes. You can schedule pickups hours or days ahead for planned shipments.

items.question: What areas do you operate in?
answer: We operate across major cities and highways in Saudi Arabia, including Riyadh, Jeddah, Dammam, and expanding nationwide.

items.question: How do I contact customer support?
answer: You can reach our support team 24/7 through the in-app chat, email, or hotline for immediate assistance.
